title: Exorbitant shabu set lunch
description: So I decided to try this much-hyped about shabu restaurant for lunch hoping to satiate my Jap hotpot craving :) But what a letdown! I left the place feeling only half full after having the pork collar shabu set. Just nine thin slices of pork

title: I love the fish milk soup!
description: Overall this restaurant's hotpot suits me and all my friends. The fish milk soup is perfect for shabu shabu. I personally find the herbal soup quite nice also  but first timer must go for the fish milk soup! I don't take beef  but my friends

title: Good food and view
description: Service is good  food is good and view is also good. Will go back again when I‚Äôm cravings for hot pot.

title: Dinner
description: The soup base is below average. Variety of choices are also minimum. The only acceptable is the meat.

title: Unhappy
description: Book in advance still need to share table! 3person still need to share table! No privacy. Bad!bad bad! Will not go again. 1st time and also last time. Fb preview cannot be trust.Super disappointing

title: Environment and Food
description: Overall everything is good. I enjoy my food with views. Out of expectations  was the food is served Ala Carte. Price paid is quite worth due to the freshness of the seafood/meat. Recommend to make reservation if going with a group.

title: Satisfying hotpot
description: Called in to reserve for dinner was a great choice as have to wait in queue if walk in. Broth like fish milk  Tom yam  mala and herbal chix was all good tasting. Meat included in our 6 pax set was Australian waygu  beef short

title: Worth the price. Would visit again.
description: We go for the 2 pax set. The food is fresh  and the soup base is nice. We choose tomato and milky fish soup for each of us. Top up $1 for the braise pork rice which is quite tasty. Staff is friendly and advise

title: Very good
description: Fresh and delicious. We had the Thai tom yum and spicy Sichuan flavours with the set of wagyu beef and pork shoulder and loads of veggies. All were great and the service was good.

title: Great Authentic Chinese Hot Pot Restaurant located near One Raffles Place (Nearest MRT Raffles MRT)
description: I came to City Hot Pot Shabu Shabu with my other half for an afternoon lunch. Very fresh ingredient served and the soup base was really good. ( *Try their Pork belly ) Great customer service from the crews and I would definitely return again.

title: Premium wagyu beef to go with hotpot
description: Premium wagyu beef to go with the varieties of hotpot. First visit  quiet environment. Different from other hot pot as this restaurant serves more premium meat.

title: A good choice to eat Hot Pot
description: Cosy dining environment and Friend service staff are the first impression left to me of City Hot Pot. After tasting the soup base and food material  I felt like it‚Äôs very suitable for local Hot Pot lovers. A good place to dine with friends or

title: a hidden jade in Raffles Place
description: a hidden jade in Raffles Place..love it! fresh food  goodlooking guy who s the boss was so lovely  good service!!!

title: MUST TRY
description: Personally feel this is the BEST Hotpot in town. Fresh food good service what a nice restaurant!MUST TRY

title: a wonderful place to visit!
description: a wonderful place to visit! with delivious soup  high quality food  friendly service and good view of CBD  i had a great dining expericen here with my friends.

title: The wagyu was not right
description: I went for lunch after hearing that this place serve nice meat  seafood n flavour soup base. Was quite disappointed with the wagyu and fish that I had order.. the fish was so tough and wagyu doesn‚Äôt convince me the meat is wagyu at all.

title: Highly recommend!
description: I really fall in love with their double flavour soup case  the refined Sichuan spicy and the Tomyam soup. I never ever found such a great taste in Singapore before. And also they are famous for fresh seafood at very affordable price.

title: Good steamboat place
description: The hotpot here has many local flavours to choose from. Do try the lu rou fan option. The servings are generous and there are many sauces to choose from. Good and affordable prices with good service. Highly recommended.

title: Amazing taste!
description: I will definitely recommond my freind to visit city hot pot during their trip to Singapore. They provide variety of soups with southeast asia receipe. The taste of the soup base still rolling in my tongue. everyone should try it!!! And the service is awesome

title: thumbs up ! amazing dish!
description: Their food are great! I like the cozy moment spent with my hubby at their window seat duiring the nightfall. A wonderful dining experience.

title: Highly recommend for meat lovers!
description: Good quality meat with reasonable price. Really love their fish soup with milk as well! Addictive!!!

title: THUMBS UP!!üëçüèªüëçüèªDefinitely One of the Best HotPot I‚Äôve tried in Singapore!!üëçüèªüëçüèª
description: THUMBS UP CityHotPot!Great dining experience in City HotPot-in the heart of CBD!Definitely one of the BEST HotPot Shabu Shabu in Singapore!Very welcoming  clean & nice ambience I chose the window sit to enjoy the scenic Raffles Place view.Love their Milk Fish Soup it‚Äôs very rich smooth & flavoursome!Seafood

title: Highly recommend for Hot Pot Lovers
description: Been a regular at this restaurant for some time and I left each visit with a satisfying and fulfilling experience. With a wide selection of very fresh seafood  meat and vege plus variety of soup bases and sauces  it‚Äôs always been a rewarding dining experience

title: Not worth it!
description: Terrible service  expensive for what we got  and mediocre hot pot. There has got to be better hot pot options in a food mecca like Singapore. Other than a terrible meal on Garuda Airlines  this was my worst meal experience of our 2 week vacation

title: FRESH   GOOD SPREAD OF PORTION
description: friendly staffs that give good recommendation. love the soup base - tomato ones especially  overall soup base good sauces are a must to have and most of them are fresh ALL of the food spread are fresh ! reasonable pricing  brightly lighted. choose the window

title: Best local hot pot in Singapore
description: I have been living in Singapore since 2010  and personally I love hot pot a lot and tried many hot pot restaurants. While I recommend city hot pot as the best local hot pot  not only because the taste is very transitional  but also the

title: Tasty hoptop that should not be missed at Raffles
description: One of my favorite places to eat Hot Pot. Their foods are clean  the atmosphere is nice and the price is reasonable. Let's talk about Soup first. There are varieties of soup to choose and my personal favorite is Spicy soup. According to my wife

title: Highly recommended restaurant
description: It has a very nice environment and fresh foods with reasonable price near MRT station and in the shopping mall  convenient and easy to find the restaurant  Highly recommended.

title: Tasty hotpot lunch
description: Came here for lunch today with some friends. Quite busy but we had a reservation so no issues getting a table with a nice view out over Raffles Place. Good selection of vegetables although the meat had too much fat. Efficient service but unfortunately no

title: Great hotpot not to be missed in Raffles
description: The soup base is strong and blends really well on all the ingredients choice available on the menu. The meat cuts are really some of the top value cuts. Would highly recommend anyone around there who wants to have a great value for money hotpot.

title: Hidden gem in raffles place
description: We found this place hidden gem on the level 4 of one Raffles Place Mall during the weekend  we were surprised by the quality of food and excellent service  the fish and milk soup was recommended to eat with Australian Wagyu beef  the seafood offered

title: So satisfying!
description: Didn't knew that there's a gem at Raffles Place! Visited this place first time today with my colleagues. We each ordered different soup base i.e. tom yum  chicken soup  vegetables soup  and fish milk soup. I had the herbal chicken soup and I really love

title: Confortable Ambience and Reasonable Price
description: Visited once in December 2016. Price was reasonable and ambience is comfortable. Just alittle squeezy. Serving was reasonable with the price. Good place for dinner after a long day of work with your colleagues.

title: Good soup base  but a little pricy
description: The soup base here is really good. I tried the tom yam and the fish milk soup base and boy it was lovely to cook the carbs last in the soup and let the carbs absorb all of the goodness in the soup after you
